text: Igor Nikolayevich Rodionov (; 1 December 1936 – 19 December 2014) was a Russian general and Duma deputy. He was best known for his service heading the Defence Ministry of the Russian Federation. ==References== ==Other websites== * U.S. Army Foreign Military Studies Office, Rodionov: A Military Biography * Person Page at NUPI Centere for Russian Studies (note: NUPI says Rodionov commanded the Transbaikal Military District in 85–86, but this is disapproved by Feskov et al.'s list of District commanders.) * Duma Deputy Biographies at US-Russian Business Council Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Soviet military people Category:People from Penza Oblast Category:Ministers of Defence of Russia
title: Igor Rodionov
